[Groovy] Class NotificationService

java.lang.Object
  NotificationService

class NotificationService

The notification service is the main entry point to the provided functionality. All the relevant methods are exposed here. Note that simple topic management operations can be handled directly by the NotificationTopic object and GORM so for now these will not be contemplated in the service.

Method Detail

createSubscriber

java.lang.Object createSubscriber(java.lang.String alias, java.util.Collection channels)

sendNotification

java.lang.Object sendNotification(java.lang.String topic, java.lang.String message, java.util.Date scheduledDate)
This is syntatic sugar. It creates a notification based on the arguments, and then calls the sendNotification method. Note that if the topic does not exist it is created.

sendNotification

java.lang.Object sendNotification(Notification notification)
Sends notifications to all subscribers - scheduling them if needed. If the notification is scheduled to begin in less than a second from the current time then it is ignored and it is immediately run.

sendNow

java.lang.Object sendNow(Notification notification)
Immediately sends notifications to the subscribers, overlooking the scheduler.

subscribeTopic

java.lang.Object subscribeTopic(Subscriber subscriber, java.lang.String topic, java.util.Collection channels)
Allows the subscription of a topic.
Returns:
subscription - The susbcription that was created.

unsubscribeTopic

java.lang.Object unsubscribeTopic(Subscriber subscriber, java.lang.String topic)
Syntatic sugar method. Unsubscribes a topic

unsubscribeTopic

java.lang.Object unsubscribeTopic(Subscriber subscriber, NotificationTopic topic)
Unsubscribes a topic
